about_the_game:
In this action-packed adventure, you will harness incredible powers to save the city from the clutches of the militia. With flight, super speed, heat vision, super strength, and x-ray vision at your disposal, you are the only one capable of taking down the enemy bases and rescuing innocent civilians.

Explore a vast open-world city, filled with exciting events and challenges around every corner. Keep an eye out for distress signals and respond quickly to save the day. Use your powers strategically to overcome obstacles and defeat the toughest enemies.

Team up with other players to take on the most challenging missions and fight together against the militia. Coordinate your powers to achieve victory and become the ultimate superhero team.

With stunning graphics and epic battles, this game will transport you to a world where anything is possible. Soar through the sky, race through the streets, and unleash your full potential as a superhero. Are you ready to save the city and become Valorous? The fate of the city is in your hands!

content_descriptors.notes: Minor Violence through attacking enemies, Punching, Heat Vision and Ground Attack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600 3.2GHz Or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600G 3.9GHz Or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2050ti Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

With exciting events, multiplayer, and stunning graphics, become a legend among heroes and unleash your full potential.
